descriptionHtml:
[color=darkorange]NEW ALTERNATE APPEARANCE ADDED.  (INCLUDES STANDALONE BROW TEXTURE.)  The new appearance is featured in the first two images on the Image tab.  (Used two different ENBs to show comparison.)[/color]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35788-1-1368737700.jpg[/img]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35788-1-1367972071.jpg[/img]

[b]GENERAL[/b]

This mod adds a follower to the game.  She is based on the Ningheim Race (see Required Mods), and can be found in Jorrvaskr.  She is marriageable.

Her primary skills are archery, two-handed, block, light armor and sneak.  She is also decent at conjuration.  At higher levels, she will become better at destruction and restoration.  (You may need to equip her with some fortify magicka gear so she can fully utilize her magic skills.)  Perks include light foot, muffled, and several archery and 2-H perks.


[b]REQUIRED MODS[/b]

This mod requires the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35474/]Ningheim Race[/url] mod by Seren4XX, HelloSanta, Urshi et. al.  Therefore, you will also need the mods Ningheim requires:

SKSE (http://skse.silverlock.org/)
Race Compatibility (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24168)
Ningheim Brows (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411)

Load this mod AFTER Ningheim.

If you wish to teach Gina spells (she doesn\'t know any spells by default) you will also need to install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037/]UFO[/url] or a similar mod.


[b]INSTALLATION/UNINSTALLATION[/b]

Use NMM or manually copy the files to your data folder.  If you manually install, I assume you can handle the manual uninstallation if necessary (most importantly, remove Gina.esp).


[b]CREDITS[/b]

Clothing used in interior screenshots is [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26811/]TM BallGown - UNPB BBP[/url] meshes and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25873/]TM BallGown conversion by zzjay for UNP[/url] textures.  ENBs in used were [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21123/] The Wilds ENB[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34910/] Nordic Seasons ENB[/url].

Armor in exterior shot is [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32846/]Daedric UNPB BBP and BBPx for PCEAr[/url].

[b]NOTE[/b]

I\'ve recently helped PixeledVixens convert some of her beutiful Ningheim presets into followers.  Check them out at [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39532/]PixeledVixens Ningheim Followers[/url]
author: geegee

files.name: Gina - A Ningheim Race Follower
files.changelogHtml: Removed Conjure Familiar from her spell list.
